title: Michael Armah
text: I am a third year PhD candidate in Statistics and Data Science and a Research Assistant in the Institute for Policy Research at Northwestern University. My research focuses on unsupervised learning and machine learning for multivariate meta-analyses. More specifically, my work statistically robust methods for exploratory analysis on hierarchical data.
